Class AbstractOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.fhir.server.operation.spi.AbstractOperation

    FHIROperation
    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends Object
implements FHIROperation

      • isAdditionalMethodAllowed

        protected boolean isAdditionalMethodAllowed​(String method)
        Determines if any methods (except GET and POST) are allowed for the operation. This can be overridden by an operation to allow additional methods.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • isAbstractResourceTypesDisallowed

        protected boolean isAbstractResourceTypesDisallowed()
        Determines if the operation disallows abstract resource types, Resource and DomainResource. TODO: Remove this method when Issue #2526 is implemented, at which time, abstract resource types will be disallowed for any operation.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • findOpDefParameter

        protected OperationDefinition.Parameter findOpDefParameter​(List<OperationDefinition.Parameter> parameters,
                                                           String name)
        Find the operation definition parameter with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        parameters - the list of parameters from the OperationDefinition
        name - the name of the parameter to find
        Returns:
        the operation definition parameter with the specified name or null if not found
